channel.title: [508] Run Code?
channel.description:
Well i need some help because when i try to run a [508] run.bat it says something like this
[b]Server loading please wait... The system cannot find the specific path. Press any key to continue...[/b]
The code inside is:
[b]@echo off @echo server loading please wait... cd ../build "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\java.exe" net/com/espeon/Server 43594 pause exit[/b]
I have Java jdk1.6.0_05 and still doesnt work! can anyone help me or give me a code to make it work so i can play 508 servers.

item.title: [508] Run Code?

item.description:
@thepker13 wrote:

Well i need some help because when i try to run a [508] run.bat it says something like this

Server loading please wait…
The system cannot find the specific path.
Press any key to continue…

The code inside is:

@echo off
@echo server loading please wait…
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\java.exe” net/com/espeon/Server 43594
pause
exit

I have Java jdk1.6.0_05 and still doesnt work! can anyone help me or give me a code to make it work so i can play 508 servers.
